name: Natural: Avoid Nested Programs referring to a Parameter Data Area not in the same application based on naming convention
description: If an Subprogram XXXNCCCC defines a parameter Data Area it must named XXXACCCC. The first 3 characters compose the application name, the 4th character indicates the type of the artifact and the last 4 characters are composed of numbers. Both the XXX and CCCC characters need to be the same. The diagnostic will report the names of the associated PDA's in violation.
total: Number of Nested Programs ( read Subprograms)
